name: relssr

body.origin:
|- wrel(cssr)
-| wceq(cssr, copab(hs0, hs1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cssr)
-| wceq(cssr, copab(hs0, hs1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cssr, copab(hs0, hs1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
body.pretty:
⊢ _S = { < hs0, hs1 > | hs0 ⊆ hs1 }
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)

comment: The subset relation is a relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 1-Aug-2019.)
